text: The Water Nymph () is a 1910 Russian silent movie directed by Vasili Goncharov.Недосягаемый, неисчерпаемый It stars Vasili Stepanov, Aleksandra Goncharova, and Andrey Gromov. The movie is based on the play The Water Nymph by Alexander Pushkin. == Actors == * Vasili Stepanov as The Miller * Aleksandra Goncharova as Natalya, His Daughter * Andrey Gromov as The Prince == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:1910 movies Category:Movies directed by Vasili Goncharov
title: The Water Nymph (1910 movie)
